scripts.publish:pre: git switch v2 && git merge master && yarn && yarn build && git commit -am 'build: update dist'
scripts.publish:after: git push && git push --tags && git switch master && git cherry-pick v2 && git push
scripts.publish:patch: yarn publish:pre; yarn version --patch && yarn publish:after
scripts.publish:minor: yarn publish:pre; yarn version --minor && yarn publish:after
